Posts.Content: LenoreA wrote: I just had two lumps taken out and the diagnosis is:Lump A-Fibroadnoma with mild epithelial atypia and fibrocystic changes. No malignancy in specimen or margins.Lump B-Fibroadenoma wtih cystic dilated ducts. Fibrocystic changes with focal duct hyperplasia. Tiny radial scar. No malignancy seen in specimen or margins.No breat cancer in family.  I was on mega doses of all kinds of fertility drugs. Can someone help me???  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Please help. Thank you!!. LenoreA LenoreA

Posts.Content: Jul 18, 2012 03:41PM LenoreA wrote: Thank you so much for your reply!  I know I should consider myself "lucky", which I do, however I  do want to stay on top of this and make the right choices.  You seem very knowledgable and wish you nothing but the best!
Posts.Title: Please help. Thank you!!. LenoreA LenoreA

Posts.Content: Jul 18, 2012 04:03PM LenoreA wrote: You are right!  It is not fun having biopsies or breast surgery-especially the worry that goes along with it!  I will be going for mammos and USs every 6 mth to stay on top of things and trying to eat organically.  Before this all happened to me, I never realized how rampant breast cancer is.  I am glad you are doing well and wish nothing but the best for all of the women experiencing this horrible illness!!
Posts.Title: Please help. Thank you!!. LenoreA LenoreA
